domain

Class LZW

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.CompressionAlgorithm
      • domain.LZW

  • public final class LZW
extends CompressionAlgorithm
    A CompressionAlgorithm implementation which uses the Lempel–Ziv–Welch algorithm with variable-length codewords and dictionary resets when full.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_HASH_TABLE_SIZE 
      static int HASH_FACTOR
      The hash factor that will be used in the rolling hash function for the ByteSequence class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LZW()
      Returns an instance of LZW with default values for maxCodewordLength and hashTableSize.
      LZW(int maxCodewordLength, int hashTableSize)
      Returns an instance of LZW with the specified values for maxCodewordLength and hashTableSize.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BitSequence compressData(byte[] originalData)
      Compresses the given data.
      byte[] decompressData(byte[] compressedData)
      Decompresses the given compressed data.
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Returns a description of the CompressionAlgorithm.
      java.lang.String getExtension()
      Returns the file extension used by the CompressionAlgorithm (for compressed files).
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns a short name for the CompressionAlgorithm.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_HASH_TABLE_SIZE

        public static final int DEFAULT_HASH_TABLE_SIZE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HASH_FACTOR

        public static final int HASH_FACTOR
        The hash factor that will be used in the rolling hash function for the ByteSequence class. The value of 257 was chosen because it is a prime number slightly larger than the size of the alphabet (symbols are single bytes, so the size of the alphabet is 256).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • LZW

        public LZW()
        Returns an instance of LZW with default values for maxCodewordLength and hashTableSize.

      • LZW

        public LZW(int maxCodewordLength,
           int hashTableSize)
        Returns an instance of LZW with the specified values for maxCodewordLength and hashTableSize.
        Parameters:
        maxCodewordLength - Maximum length for variable-length LZW codewords (it determines the maximum size of the dictionary).
        hashTableSize - Size of the hash table that will be passed to ByteSequence and LZWDictionary.
